SCENARIO.title: Aging Madness - Age 2
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: How fast can you get to Classical Age? Find out if your resource management is good enough.
SCENARIO.INTRO: Easy Mode. The goal is to reach the Classical Age in 3 minutes or less.

SCENARIO.title: Aging Madness - Age 4
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: How fast can you get to Gunpowder Age? Find out if your resource management is good enough.
SCENARIO.INTRO: Medium Mode. The goal is to reach the Gunpowder Age in 14 minutes or less.

SCENARIO.title: Aging Madness - Age 8
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: How fast can you get to Information Age? Find out if your resource management is good enough.
SCENARIO.INTRO: Difficult Mode. The goal is to reach the Information Age in 30 minutes or less.

SCENARIO.title: Raiding Party
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: Take your bloodthirsty Mongol horde and pay a visit to some enemy towns in an exercise of micromanagement.
SCENARIO.INTRO: In this test, you are Ghengis Khan and must lead your bloodthirsty Mongol horde to pillage the countryside. There are four nations surrounding you, each with its own deadly defenses. Keep in mind that enemy troops are too frightened of the Mongol horde to enter your territory; also, more nomads will join the horde every two minutes. Kill 100 civilian units (Citizens, Merchants, and Caravans) in 10 minutes to win. (Caravans are worth triple.)

SCENARIO.title: Hotkey Handling
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: Do you know your hotkeys? This is a test of hotkey knowledge.
SCENARIO.INTRO: Do you know your hotkeys? Press the right hotkey or hotkey combination to pass 25 out of the 30 rounds in order to win.

SCENARIO.title: Protect the Wonder
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: Protect your Wonder from jealous enemies in an exercise in defense.
SCENARIO.INTRO: Your nation owns a magnificient Wonder. Your neighbors are jealous and are plotting to destroy it. There will be five waves of enemy attacks in this scenario, and build times are instant. At the start of each wave, your citizens will give you a vast amount of resources as Tribute, after which you will have thirty seconds to prepare for the next wave of attack. Keep your Wonder alive, and beat all five waves in order to win.

SCENARIO.title: Tactics
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: Defeat the enemy troops to take control of a valuable resource without losing more than half your army in this test of generalship.
SCENARIO.INTRO: An enemy nation has control of a deadly rare resource, and your nation has sent an army to defeat them in order to take control of the rare resource. Keep at least half your army alive to win, or risk upsetting your citizens at home and losing.

SCENARIO.title: Whack the General
SCENARIO.DESCRIPTION: How fast can you click your mouse? This is a test of clicking ability.
SCENARIO.INTRO: Select the highlighted General. There are three levels of difficulty, each mode lasting for 10 possible clicks. 25 out of 30 possible clicks are required to win.
